posts.post_title: WTB:  T206 HOFers w/ Cycle, Sovereign, EPDG, etc.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David R
I'd be interested in any of the following HOFers with any back except Piedmont or Sweet Caporal:  

Keeler (both)
Brown (portrait)
Tinker (all)
Waddell (both)
Mathewson (portrait)
Collins (both)
Baker 
Davis
Huggins portrait
Young (throwing and glove)
Wheat
Johnson (pitching)

I'm also looking for a green Cobb (any back) for under $1000 if anyone has one for sale in that price range.

Thanks,

David R
